text: Meurig (also known as Maurice) (died 1161) was a Welsh cleric who was Bishop of Bangor from 1139 to 1161. Meurig continued the rebuilding of Bangor Cathedral. ==Notes== Category:1161 deaths Category:Bishops of Bangor Category:12th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Year of birth unknown Category:12th-century Welsh people
title: Meurig (bishop)
